rows.label: qst610301_msg0001
rows.name:
Hey! Hey, you, strong-looking Driver
over there!

rows.label: qst610301_msg0002
rows.name: Please hear out Toutour's request!

rows.label: qst610301_msg0003
rows.name:
Well, my job is to guide folks around
Superbia, you see.

rows.label: qst610301_msg0004
rows.name:
And this time, I was meant to show four
Nopon guests around a factory on a
tour with an industrial sort of flavor...

rows.label: qst610301_msg0005
rows.name:
Strange fellows, they were. Seemed to
like manufacturing more than they did
three square meals a day...

rows.label: qst610301_msg0006
rows.name:
But then, as soon as we stepped foot
inside the factory premises, they just
up and disappeared somewhere!

rows.label: qst610301_msg0007
rows.name: ...And then they never came back...

rows.label: qst610301_msg0008
rows.name:
Now, I'm sure you see how something
like that would leave me in a pickle!
So here I am, looking to get help, but...

rows.label: qst610301_msg0009
rows.name:
Thanks so much! Honestly, I was really
hoping you'd say that!

rows.label: qst610301_msg0010
rows.name:
Now, each of the four customers had
a particular interest of their own, so
let me fill you in...

rows.label: qst610301_msg0011
rows.name: Haihabaiha-san seems to like high places.

rows.label: qst610301_msg0012
rows.name:
Mushishi can't get enough of boiling-hot
spots.

rows.label: qst610301_msg0013
rows.name:
Old man Nkuku has a thing for strong
smells. If you find him, maybe consider
keeping upwind... Just a thought.

rows.label: qst610301_msg0014
rows.name:
And last, but certainly not least,
Didimu was curious about clammy
attics. ...I know, right?

rows.label: qst610301_msg0015
rows.name:
Really, I feel like leaving them there
might be to Noponkind's benefit, but...
*sigh* I do feel kind of responsible now.

rows.label: qst610301_msg0101
rows.name:
It'd be great if you could bring back
those four customers of mine that
wandered off in the factory!

rows.label: qst610301_msg0201
rows.name:
Thanks to you, my customers are back
safe and sound, so my reputation won't
suffer.

rows.label: qst610301_msg0202
rows.name:
Better yet, they all seem super happy
with the experience. What a bunch of
weirdos, I swear...

rows.label: qst610301_msg0203
rows.name:
Well, whatever, I won't dwell on it.
If they're happy, then I'm happy!
And thank you for all your help!

rows.label: qst610301_msg0204
rows.name:
Oh, no need to be so humble. Here's
a reward from the customers! ...Though
it's just junk they found in the factory...

rows.label: qst610301_msg0205
rows.name:
And I'll throw in a little bit extra, too.
Thanks again for saving me from four
whole one-star reviews!
